mapper.select: SELECT I.ITEM_ID , I.ITEM_NAME , I.ITEM_TYPE , I.USE_YN , I.ITEM_UNIT , I.ITEM_COST , I.INB_INSP , I.WAREHOUSE_ID , (SELECT WAREHOUSE_NAME FROM WAREHOUSE w WHERE I.WAREHOUSE_ID = W.WAREHOUSE_ID) AS WAREHOUSE_NAME , I.SAFETY_INVENTORY , I.DESCRIPTION FROM ITEM I ORDER BY ITEM_ID ASC

SELECT MAIN_ID , SUB_ID , SUB_NAME FROM MES_COMMON WHERE MAIN_ID IN ('MATL', 'UNIT') AND USE_STATUS = 'Y' AND (MAIN_ID != 'MATL' OR SUB_ID IN ('FP', 'SF')) ORDER BY CASE WHEN MAIN_ID = 'MATL' AND SUB_ID = 'SF' THEN 1 -- 반제품(SF) 우선 정렬 WHEN MAIN_ID = 'MATL' AND SUB_ID = 'FP' THEN 2 -- 완제품(FP) 다음 정렬 ELSE 3 -- 그 외 (UNIT 포함) END, MAIN_ID, SUB_ID -- 동일한 우선순위 내에서 추가 정렬

SELECT WAREHOUSE_ID , WAREHOUSE_NAME , WAREHOUSE_TYPE , WAREHOUSE_STATUS FROM WAREHOUSE WHERE 1 = 1 AND WAREHOUSE_ID NOT IN (SELECT WAREHOUSE_ID FROM ITEM) AND WAREHOUSE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY WAREHOUSE_ID ASC
